website_summaries.verdict: This luxurious airbed is highly durable and comfortable to sleep on, but it is on the pricey side.
pros: Twin, queen, and California king sizes available
Coil-beam construction for comfort and support
Endorsed by the International Chiropractors Association
cons: Some owners say the storage bag is of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Good, large size. Quite comfortable. We were more than pleased with it! My husband is 6'3" and weighs about 260. I'm not a little person, either. It was much more comfortable than we expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: *great customer service *
customer_reviews.text: *Updated Review: I initially had to replace this item due to a big leak. I contacted customer service and they sent me a new one. I because of house construction I have had it inflated continuously for about on and off for about six months and my guests are amazed that it's an inflatable. I've had friends of all shapes and sizes on it and they all have liked it. I even had a friend have her baby sleep on it next to her and it was not an issue at all, no sagging or feeling like the mattress was going to shift. Amazing. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Castastone

customer_reviews.title: Confortable bed to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on it last night and was impressed with the support and quality of rest I experienced. It was very easy and fast to inflate/deflate. I purchased a mattress pad with extra cushion and the picture shows how it fitted together with the King Koil Queen size inflatable mattress. Now I have a bed my guests can sleep confortable that is very easy to store and takes almost no place to store.
customer_reviews.author: MPB

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!  A must have for every home.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air mattress. It feels more like a good bed instead of something you can store away so easily. Grandsons, 8 and 9 age live a couple of hours away. It is so easy to put in the play room while they are here visiting. When they have to go back home, I can store away in closet. It only takes a couple of minutes to air and deflate. The sheets recommended that I got with it works perfect. No slipping at all. Ten star rating here. Oh the comfort is amazing as I have napped several times myself on it.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: King Koil was great to work with after our first mattress didn't hold air. They were proactive in making sure we were satisfied and got us another bed promptly. It appears that our issues prior were one off and just bad luck. The new bed is great, blows up quick and deflates and packs easily. It was nice to know they stand behind their product and is easy to work with if an issue should arise.
customer_reviews.author: Riley T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize there was a deadline on the return if needed and now we're stuck with a defected air mattress and wasted $98 plus
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time when our son visited from Conn. and it lost its air 3 times over night. Didn't realize there was a deadline on the return if needed and now we're stuck with a defected air mattress and wasted $98 plus. If you still buy it. I suggest trying it out before the return date deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bed itself is nice but I ordered a queen and it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is nice but I ordered a queen and it is not a queen. I am 5'6" and my feet were over edge. More like a full size bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this air mattress based on all the reviews, but the first night we used it for our guest (my stepmother) it lost air half way through the night causing her to sink. We thought perhaps it was because it was the first night, but even on the second night, we let out kids sleep on it, and it still lost so much air that they sank as well. Such a shame at this price point. We even inflated it for many hours before using as it recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect results.
customer_reviews.text: Nice height so it doesn’t make you feel like your sleeping on a hiking pad. The pump is very nice and quick on inflation and deflation. Comfortable for sure. Nice flocked texture so the sheets don’t slip off, and tote bag to store it too. Obviously fitting a queen sized mattress in the middle of a studio apartment makes it look huge but it’s perfect for guests when they stay for a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic and convenient mattress the first few months. I purchased in Feb 2018 and by Oct it was leaking to the point where it lost 1/3 of the volume in just 4-5 hrs. It was leaking thru the motors air valve. I'm currently trying to get King Koil to honor the 1 year warranty. So far no luck. In the mean time I have switched to a fold out camping cot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miles

customer_reviews.title: "1 year guarantee" is a big lie!!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this mattress, but the first night I used it, I realized it had a small leak somewhere, as I had to re-inflate multiple times throughout the night. Not a huge deal as products can sometimes arrive defective, which I understand. I reached out to King Koil about their 1-year guarantee, and someone (Patrick) responded immediately promising to replace the mattress. HOWEVER when I replied with my mailing info, I got no response back :( I'm really upset that I was promised this replacement and then Patrick just ghosted me. Where are you, Patrick (or anyone from customer service???)????
customer_reviews.author: Jasleen Kaur

customer_reviews.title: "Easy to Setup and Easy to Put Away"
customer_reviews.text: I got my new King Koil air mattress and it rocks. It's got a built in pump which makes it super easy to setup and even comes with a carrying case. How cool is that!!! Very high quality, nice size, affordable...an overall great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second try.
customer_reviews.text: I bought California king about 2 years ago before the year was up it had a leak.. they sent me a replacement without any run around which I appreciated but once again before 6 months is up there is another leak by seam..I'm so frustrated I thought maybe its not that big so I looked for patch kit and there isn't one, then I remembered there wasn't one in first purchase either..If you look on comments it seems I'm not the only one who is missing, said patch kit...I contacted King Koil about the new leak in second bed thinking it may be a flaw in the California king, such as weak seams but have not heard a word.
customer_reviews.author: skeie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased at Amazon due to their stellar return ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: KK sent a new mattress out immediately which has worked out very well. They’ve also followed up with texts asking how the mattress is functioning. Holes in the middle of the baffles after less than a month - had to return. Glad I purchased at Amazon due to their stellar return policy. Glad she kept the box!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Floating on a Cloud: Whats important to know is the materials that it's made from.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most....strong/support holds up my weight 240 lbs. Very comfortable I love the dip in stead flat top. Currently using it as a temporary bed while on vacation. What I like least about the bed "Well simply I cant keep it as a bed". Mainly because I have a cat back home and the other reason I would never want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Shinaberry

customer_reviews.title: Weak inner seams come apart.
customer_reviews.text: After about 20 days total usage, the inner seams separated causing sides and top to bulge out so sheets no longer fit and top became uneven then it began having difficulty deflating whenever we tried to deflate it. Our combined weight is only 300 lbs. so, the bed was not overloaded. Opted for refund instead of replacement because a replacement will most likely have the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: KBW

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a few days.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to sleep on during a move. Worked great the few days before we moved. I packed it up like it was when we got it and we moved. At the new house as soon as it was inflated I could hear a hissing leak from within the pump housing. I was going to open it up to see if it was something I could fix easily, but they used those triangle drive screws so I cant get into it yet. I dont like paying this much for something that only works for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality thick material, easy to use, smell goes away after airing it out for about 2 days. I had originally written a 1 star review as my mattress did not hold air, however I found I had a defective air mattress. King Coils customer service was very responsive and fast, shipped me a new bed no questions asked and it works very well. I’m very happy they responded to my original review and I decided to give the bed another chance. I highly recommend this mattress because if it doesn’t work for your their customer service team will make it right, which is in my opinion a number one deciding factor for me to recommend a product or business.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R.

customer_reviews.title: Just 1, 2, 3 .. and it off to dreamland! Sweet dreams ...!
customer_reviews.text: First: It comes in a durable tote bag (inside the box) and within only a couple days after ordering! So quick. Second: It took only 2/3 minutes to pull out from bag, plug in and get to an impressive 22” height and ready to use! Third: It stores SO compactly in a closet between uses! Everything denotes quality and convenience! A Thousand dollar mattress’s comfort for a “C” note! What can beat that?
customer_reviews.author: J. Alan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking air on the 3rd use. Leaking at top seam right corner of bed. The bed is very high and heavy duty, but if an air mattress won’t hold air you’re kind of out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: OK but design oversights if you are using for camping
customer_reviews.text: They advertise this product as good for camping but there is no way to manually inflate (or easily deflate) the mattress. The Queen version has a safety valve but (surprisingly) they didn’t bother to put one on the King version. If you are camping and find yourself without electricity, the mattress is pretty much worthless. This is a substantial design oversight on an otherwise ok product. Additionally, in six attempts I could not get a straight answer to a simple question. The customer service / after sale support is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have blown this bed up 5xs and it's only been 4 days. It sinks in the middle, soft on the outside. I hate it!!. It also stinks. I purchased one last year and it felt more firmer and stayed inflated for weeks, but had to keep patching, but not sure if seller is selling defected air mattresses. Update. Fast replacement. Family compliments of a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: ms little

customer_reviews.title: Deflated Over Night!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is terrible. Every night that I have used it I fill it all the way up and half way through the night I wake up and I feel like a have been swallow by the bed. Do not buy. It cannot hold inflation through the night. UPDATE: King Koil did reach out and is replacing our bed free of charge. I can most definitely rate the customer service an A+++.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Mihm

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s house to use for sleepover guests. This mattress deflated over the course of the night the 1st time we used it. I reinflated in the morning, but the same thing happened the 2nd night. Instructions say to look for leak by rubbing mattress with soapy water. Really?? That is not a viable option with a huge inflated object. Very disappointed and money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: sbsw

customer_reviews.title: In 4 days, yes 4 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: My air mattress developed a small rip around one of the infatuation spots. We used the enclosed patch. However, due to the location of the rip, it didn’t hold. The air mattresses was still under warranty. I emailed the company with a photo of the tear on a Sunday. I received acknowledgement the next day, Monday. I had a new replacement air mattress by That Wednesday! The situation was resolved in 4 days!...Yes, 4 days! Koodoo’s to King Koil. It’s not only about the product, but the customer service is what put them over the top! I am totally satisfied and will recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Boston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for a family trip and found it to be disappointing. It is fairly unstable unless one long side is against a wall, and it seems quite short for our 5’6” daughter to sleep on. Fortunately our 6’2” son didn’t have to rely on it. Overall we wouldn’t purchase this again. Though it is what it says, it doesn’t work as well in actual use as it does on paper.
customer_reviews.author: Msocks

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 3 months. It popped w one person on it.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t even let 3 months. Woke up to a pop and the coils at the bottom of the bed were bulging on top and on the side. It is now in the landfill after trying to call and email customer service for their guaranteed 1 year warranty w no response. Wasted 199.00 for the King size. Completely upset and disappointed. Highly do NOT recommend. Better off getting something cheap that will pop in due time and replacing it over and over vs spending 200.00 for 3 months use.
customer_reviews.author: EaE

customer_reviews.title: Deflated on 2nd use; comfortable when inflated
customer_reviews.text: When inflated, very comfortable. I used full-sized sheets on it and they worked fine. Unfortunately, it deflated during the night and I had to re-inflate during the night to continue sleeping. The helpful company sent a 2nd air mattress, but it was, unfortunately, worse. In the 2nd night, I had to re-inflate it 4 times and it had little air in the morning. It was not conducive to a good night's sleep. I am returning it for a refund. Many reviewers describe a similar experience, but I was hoping the replacement mattress would work. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: MP in Buffalo Grove

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was great the first few days but now you sink in very uncomfortable to turn with out making effort since your sinked in. I used it a couple of days. Ive had it for less than a month
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be Fooled!
customer_reviews.text: This is your typical cheap air mattress. It leaked the first night, I checked to see if the bed was punctured or if I did something wrong and found nothing. Even when the bed was inflated, I wasn't too happy with the big hump on the bed. With my pillow, it was too much height for my neck. So, by the time I put my pillow in front of the big hump, my feet hung well over the side. I'll be returning the bed.
customer_reviews.author: vesais

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up over night
customer_reviews.text: This mattress you have to blow up 2 or 3 times a night I wouldn’t purchase another one, had different brand before and pumped it once a night
customer_reviews.author: rocky malone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate/deflate: high quality: super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all of the great reviews written on air mattresses: they helped me select this one and we are not disappointed. EASY to inflate and deflate and return into carrying sack. Not too heavy (my 93lb college-aged daughter shleps it home if I ever ask). Twin sheets fit on great, and all who have used it report it is “super comfy!” Requires electric plug-in. Carrying sack is thin nylon, and beginning to wear, but I’m thinking I can replace it by repurposing an average-sized sleeping-bag sack (or something similar) as needed.
customer_reviews.author: TBH22

customer_reviews.title: Leaks (like other reviews)
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the reviews, it doesn't hold air or stay firm, for more than 1 hour. Mine got progressively worse and started deflating (almost flat) to the point I'd end up with my feet above my head! It would be comical if it wasn't so unnecessary and a waste of my time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been looking forward to this mattress for weeks, hoping to create some comfort on our many camping trips. However, the first time we use it and inflate the mattress the pump quits half way through inflation. We called customer service and they helped troubleshoot and we completed the inflation. Unfortunately, the mattress did not stay inflated and we ended up on the tent floor and ended up sleeping in our car. We ended up having to request a refund. Even though the product did not met our expectations the customer service was very responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support
customer_reviews.text: Update, the consumer support send me a new one for the year warranty. The new matrees it's perfect now. I used it 4 times already and everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer service
customer_reviews.text: When it works it’s good but it’s only been used for about 30 night and after about 20 it started developing small holes. As soon as you fix one it seems another pops up right away. I don’t have small children or any pets. It’s been used by responsible adult. Not worth the cost at all. Even though I had the issues listed above after posting my issues the company reached out to me within 24 hours and got me a replacement bed delivered within 36 hours. They didn’t ask me to change my negative review (like most do!) or anything! Because of their customer service I will most definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Archie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service. Great queen air mattress
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine UNTIL the very last day I could return it which was yesterday!! It deflates every 5 mins, wont hold air anymore. Very DISSATISFIED with this product. I would not recommend this to anyone. Looks like I'm eating the cost and my guests are still here and have no where to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Don't  buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a year ago and then didn't need it till now. Inflation is diffucult and bed doesn't hold air over night. If it held air it would be comfortable. O well Update Costumer service contacted us after original review. First they sent the wrong size, finaly got another King size mattress, this one holds air well enough so if its blown up as you go to bed its bearable for the night, especially if its re-inflated once in the night. If I was in the return window I'd I'd deffently return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Two mattresses and both defective and leaking
customer_reviews.text: The first mattress leaked right out of the box. Notified seller and they sent me a replacement mattress. The second one lasted three weeks and last night 3am, it started loosing air. Filled it up and by 4:40 it was too low to sleep on. Filled it up one more time and by 7 am it was down again. Very disappointed and unable to return. Please note that I have no kids no pets and sleep alone. Unlucky? Perhaps but it also says something about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: TimeTraveller

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the bed for traveling and guests. I have not used it yet. I have inflated it to try it out. It seems very sturdy and holds the air fairly well. Regular sheets seem to fit it and stays put. It is impressively comfortable. I did not think air mattresses could be so comfortable. It’s more comfortable than most regular beds I have owned. It inflates & deflates very fast. Hopefully it will last because this is the best air mattress I have ever tried. My 6 year old nephew loved it and wants on for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: Leaked though seller promptly replaced it
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice but my mattress had a slow leak from the day I took it out of the box. I followed the instruction exactly. I reflated several times a night but within an hour it sunk to half. A positive is that customer service sent me a free replacement promptly. Testing the new one now. I advise readers to read some articles about air mattresses and how to prevent leaks before buying one. I think mattresses where the seller claims to have tested each one for leaks are safer.
customer_reviews.author: Dpperry

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, if you like sleeping on the floor
customer_reviews.text: The quality of material seems good, however what wasn't good was the hole in the mattress right out of the box above the pump. It ruined my vacation at a cabin up north in Wisconsin as every morning I woke up at 6am and have to fill it back up for a temporary mattress. My buddy purchased an Aerobed and his worked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Complete Recycling Services, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Deflated-NEW UPDATE SEPT '18
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for out of towners. We tried to inflate it for two nights and by the morning my guests were falling out of the bed onto the floor. I returned it. UPDATE: Upon seeing my review, customer service sent me a new bed free of charge. Their customer service is really great, I will update further on how well the bed holds up as I use it in the next couple months, but I appreciate them making it right.
customer_reviews.author: HizzoT

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived really fast and I had it pumped up and ready to use in 10 minutes. I did read the instructions so really on needed 5 minutes. Plug it in and turn it on. When you reach the firmness you want, close the valve and turn off the inflator (built into the bed). To deflate, just open the valve and start the blower. The bed is rugged and can be moved easily. Fitted sheets work with it. I do recommend you put a blanket under the sheet so you don't get cold overnight. The slight raised head works great to keep pillows on the bed. Other beds do not have it and pillows slid off.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just 3 days past warranty expiration
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bed - it was comfortable - a good height to make getting in and out of easier. I noticed that a seam on the side had popped. It was just a "decorative" seam - nothing that would let the air out. I should have done something at that time - that was probably a week within the warranty. But a seam on the other side that did let out air popped yesterday. Because it is a seam and at an angle the patches won't work there. So although it was comfortable, I would not really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Toney

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The bed was nice looking. Ordered a California King, after a few months the motor on the inflation went out. They replaced it with a regular King. Then every few weeks holes would appear with body weight (I'm about 190#). The warranty only covers defects, therefore the holes was not covered. I guess it could be of better quality. I would recommend taking the money and just getting a regular mattress if you need it more than a few months Update- they sent a new air mattress to correct the issues I had with the other one. Due to their dedication and service, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: darina weathers

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bed until that 1 year warrenty expired =/
customer_reviews.text: This was like the king of all air matresses. My famiy and friends were envious and I was in love! I and my two kids go up north to see my uncle quite often and we all three fit on this bed comfortably (they are small 7 and 5) This had to have been my best purchace for travel. Then a year went by and all of a sudden I was waking up with my butt on the ground. I loved this bed but it is way to expensive for it to only last a year. I will have to purchase another bed from somewhere else and hope it last more then a year.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother! - UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is leaking out of the box. I took manufacturer's comments that mattress stretches in the beginning and air may have to be added to keep it firm into account, but it continues to soften still after weeks. I have never had this issue with other brand mattresses (and I have lots of experience). Also, it has a problem with easily tipping. This may be related to the softening and/or its extreme height. All in all: a waste of money! UPDATE: After leaving the above review, manufacturer contacted me and was ready to ship a new mattress under warranty to me, but I asked for a refund instead and was granted that request! Customer Service definitely an A+.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela H.

customer_reviews.title: Fabut
customer_reviews.text: My husband and are not tiny people, so when we normally bought an air mattress, we were under the 600# limit of all our queen sized, but they eventually started to leak...we also use our air bed multiple times a year, so we feel we get our use out of it....the space on this California king and the support it gives was amazing! Can't wait til our camping trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several of these air mattresses and this one has been the best! I’ve woken up in previous mattresses like the meat in a taco shell. There are soo many choices on Amazon of air mattresses and they basically all claim the same so your just Hoping that you get a good one. I GOT A HOOD ONE! This one was comfortable, it kept me cool and I slept as if I was in my own bed. I had this mattress sent to my sons house so he wouldn’t have to make accommodations for me on my visit and I left it there.... I really wanted to take it back home with me LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja A.

customer_reviews.title: The only one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you're even *thinking* about some kind of extra sleep surface, buy this. We're going back & forth about Murphy bed vs. sleep sofa but needed an instant solution, and got this. Perfection! And when we had to go to a family thing where there weren't enough beds, we packed this small (18" by 15"?) box and a duvet and slept it real comfort for 3 nights! Total ease to inflate and to deflate to completely flat for repacking. Buy this as an emergency even if you don't know you need it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sooz Hall

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working fixed nowafter only using one time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a friend was coming to stay a few days, Everything was great, aired up fine, held air, and he said slept well. Went to use it again a month later and the air pump wont work. Stored it in the bedroom closet, in its bag it came with, not sure why motor stopped. Now its past the exchange with Amazon, and I can't find a number to call the company that states 1 year . A lot of money wasted on one night. Update, the company sent me a replacement and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Betcaptn

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 Serta air mattresses before purchasing this King Koil !! And as a sufferer of lower back pain , the Serta's never came close to the comfort and back pain relief , that the King Koil offers !! Thank You Very Much !! The only reason , I did not give this product 5 Stars , was because the , " Emergency Valve " , should be at the foot of the bed , not at the head , where it creates a space for the pillows to fall into , not to mention the strain it puts on the valve itself , Other than that it is a very comfortable bed to sleep on !!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel W. Racanelli

customer_reviews.title: The company stand by their product and respond quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is extremely comfortable and the height is that of a regular bed. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fields

customer_reviews.title: Need new bed
customer_reviews.text: My bed felt great but I can’t find sheets to stay on the bed or matress cover and I’ve bought king size deep pockets Now it does not hold air No holes. I believe it’s coming from plug. I have to put air in few times. It’s frustrating. I sleep on this as my bed. Not something that goes away and reblown up. I did however once undo the plug and now it’s definitely pushed back in n then problem occurs. I feel once I opened seal it’s bad. What are my options. It’s not even a year old I spent money on sheets that can’t use bottom sheet.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Great air bed!
customer_reviews.text: I slept on the King Koil Twin Double High air bed for two weeks while helping my daughter with her newborn. It was very comfortable, did not leak, and the extra height made it easy to get in and out of bed. It was of course not as firm as a real coil spring mattress but very firm by air bed standards. I topped it up with more air every 2-3 days to keep that firmness, but it didn’t actually leak. I followed the instructions and inflated it at home for a few days before sleeping on it. That let the plastic smell dissipate and let the plastic stretch out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Fragile update: Surprising king koil customer service solution
customer_reviews.text: Complaint: Lasted 2 months. Small growing tear in a seam. Not repairable. Fragile with poor materials. Weak design. Waste of money. King Koil resolution: Within 2 days (during the weekend!) of contacting customer service by email with this manufacturing fail King koil customer service acknowledged the problem and is sending a replacement new and better better queen mattress via priority! I am Very Surprised and blown away! Best response I could have ever expected. Great value. When not leaking it provided me with a great nights sleep with a stable and comfortable top surface. Now I highly recommend king koil customer service and the power of Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed, fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest air bed I've ever owned. I like the double height and my kids love sleeping on it for sleepovers. They say it is the most comfortable bed they've ever slept on! They both have said they'd like to get rid of their normal beds! I slept on it a couple times and it's not the greatest for very tall adults. I'm 6' and my feet hung over the end. It was still a good nights sleep for being on an air bed. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amamb4533

customer_reviews.title: Slept great and loved not having to get up and down ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for camping (glamping?) and was the envy of all of my friends. Slept great and loved not having to get up and down off the ground after ACL surgery. The bed held up very well and is comfortable and sturdy enough to use as a guest bed if that is a need.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE - King Koil contacted me about this and replaced the mattress IMMEDIATELY. I didn’t even know this type of customer service still existed. Totally happy - THANK YOU Amazon and King Koil!! UPDATE*** ——- I bought two of these through Amazon. I bought them for the 4th of July and one doesn’t maintain its air. It’s been over 30 days since I received it so no returns, even though I only used it once. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gray

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: This bed was good when we got it, but within less then 6 months of sporadic use now it’s motor to inflate or deflate the bed has slowed down, it takes really long time for it to do the job and it seems like it is going to give up any moment. This is an Envionmental disaster if we have to replace it every few months. It is well design bed but should have longer lasting motor.
customer_reviews.author: vb

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is staying with me for a while until she can return to work. This mattress is comfortable and firm enough to support ones weight all through the night. It have a soft top panels where you really don't need any sheets. The pump is inside the mattress and quick and easy to inflate. It's also high off the ground not close to the floor. It also comes with a convenient carrying bag. The only thing is you might need to add air before each use because the air will go down each day you use it. However this will support you good through the night.
customer_reviews.author: werehog7777

customer_reviews.title: Smell is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the comfort or durability because I couldn't use it. I read the negative reviews and didn't see this mentioned, so maybe I got a bad one, but it smells so strongly of vinyl, or whatever it is made of, it actually gave me a headache. I inflated it, and let it air out for a week in the garage because I couldn't stand the smell inside the house. The smell has not gotten better. It will definitely be going back.
customer_reviews.author: LookingForSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I had in years.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the King Coil air mattress while my furniture was in storage in between moves and renovations. I was a little skeptical since most air mattresses deflate over time but this has not. We've been on it for about 2 months now and it has been the best mattress I've had in years. The king size is great, the built in inflation and deflation vent and pump make it a snap to raise or lower in a matter of minutes. As far as adding air, maybe once every 2 weeks a little but that is it. For extra comfort, we added a 3 in memory foam topper which I'm sure helps but the mattress itself is just a comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: plasticpipe

customer_reviews.title: My guest had a problem staying on the mattress because ...
customer_reviews.text: This a new review of King Koil Air Beds. They replaced my last one qith the same style air mattress so the review remains the same. It is a bad design where the sides do not have enough support and the mattress has a tendency to want to roll to the side and roll you right off the mattress. I have three of them now and they all have the same problem. I will not buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Vickey

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Mattress, Easy to Fix, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Our first air mattress lasted about eight times before it started leaking. We thought it was a fluke, so we called customer service and easily got a replacement. They have great customer service. The second one also eventually got leaky, maybe after five uses. They wouldn't replace a second time. We have been able to locate the small slits and repair them easily with leak tape. It's been annoying to deal with over the last two years, but usually we get a great night sleep and these mattresses are very comfortable, even when they leak overnight. Inflating and deflating these mattresses are as easy and slick as it can possibly be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ness

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: After conducting hours of research I went with this mattress primarily for camping use. It is extremely easy to inflate with the built-in pump - only took a couple of minutes. Take down is also fast and easy. The mattress is very comfortable. The storage bag that it comes with is large so no problem putting it away without going crazy trying to cram it in, the bag was big enough for me to fit a sheet with still plenty of room to spare as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Hole on Top
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to use, was very happy until about the 6th week a tiny hole developed on the top part of mattress. Used the patches provided with the mattress, and it held for about a week. I strongly feel a King Koil air mattress should last longer than 6 weeks. Instead of going to a less expensive retail store and paying half the price, paid more for a hopefully better quality. Two people sleep on the mattress with a combined weight of 320lbs. Thank You very much, we are so disappointed. If you can help in any way I would be grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Christine in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 2 stars because at least in my experience it isn't worth the price. I purchased my queen at the end of August last year and have only used it twice. I am in the process of moving and will be staying with my daughter for a few weeks and cannot use it now due to a hole. The hole is obviously due to a quality construction issue, and it located right around a circular seem. Update: talked with customer service and I've already been sent a brand new bed. Very impressed with their timely response and how understandable they were.
customer_reviews.author: marlene perez

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Received new bed and worked perfect. The new bed style is different then the first bed we received that did not hold air. Customer service was fast at responding and correcting the issue. Received this bed yesterday and have had to air it up at least 5 times in 12 hours. Bought it for family coming in this week. Decided to test it out and it’s worthless. Extremely disappointed. Took a picture of what it looked like 30 minutes after fully airing bed up.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this air mattress but I think the dials to blow it up or deflate it are a little strange and not sure why they are part of the design. I don't understand why they are needed beyond the on/off switch. It's easy to inflate and is very comfortable. Easy to deflate as well as it sucks all of the air out which is nice. Good price point. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa4r

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am not accustomed to spending this amount on an air mattress. We travel a lot for hockey tournaments and have 3 kids. We are often in hotel rooms with only 2 queen beds. So we bought this as a way to have another bed when we travel. It honestly is worth every penny. It inflates really fast. This really is the Rolls Royce of air mattresses. The only negative is I have a hard time rolling it back up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best air mattress i have ever purchased! i have had many air mattresses that would deflate in by morning. i have had it for about a year and have gotten many uses out of it. My guess are always amazed that it looks like a nice mattress, and that it sleeps GOOD! I have recommended King Coil to many of my friends and family and would not buy any other mattress This item is a bit spendy but totally worth it, if you are looking to sleep on an air mattress that you can actually be comfortable and get sleep on. You will be surprised! Louis D Approved!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Davis

customer_reviews.title: King Koil Customer Srvice is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We got our King Koil mattress in a very timely manner, but on our first use we realized it had a small leak. Per the instructions, we contacted King Koil and they informed us there was a one-year warranty and would replace the bed. After sending the required information, we had a new bed in just four days!! The queen bed is very comfortable and it is easy to add the air and easay to deflate. Really a great bargain for the price too. We would highly recommend this product to anyone searching for an additional for visitiors, taking on road trips, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sumoflam

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The first one had a leak somewhere. But like everyone else, I found that customer service was SUPER fast, and easy to deal with. I contacted them by email and they had replied within an hour. They sent me a replacement and it arrived in less than a week. I especially appreciated that I didn’t have to return the old one or jump through hoops to prove the leak, because I honestly couldn’t find it. I think it was somewhere around the actual pump. The new one actually looks a little sturdier, maybe the material is more durable? It blows up fully in 3-4 minutes and worked perfectly for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wannemacher

customer_reviews.title: Leaked in multiple places after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: Not a good version of air mattress. It leaked and even though I sealed a visible leak, it kept leaking. Could never find other source. Would deflate throughout night and sleeper would be on floor by morning! Maybe slept on it 5 times total :(
customer_reviews.author: BJGC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Their customer service has been excellent. They’ve replaced the leaky bed and have been consistently communicative. Very impressed! Was happy with it for several months, but as soon as I started using it more than once a week, it started leaking and deflating on its own. I’ve used the bed fewer than 20 times and it’s leaking problem has gradually gotten worse. Giving 2 stars because it’s a solid air mattress if not for the leaking issue.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe I.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, doesn’t bounce unless you jump on it and doesn’t sway side to side. Bought this for a temporary bed during a move, sold our old mattress and was going to buy a new mattress after the move. We are still sleeping on this 5 months later. We just put it inside our wood bed frame and can’t tell it’s an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: doityourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat through the night! :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ease of setting up the bed (that gets 5 ⭐️)—— I DID NOT love that it deflated through the night!!! We set this up last night, ensured all valves were tight, and within about 15-30 minutes it started losing its air and firmness!!! :( It was so uncomfortable sleeping on it while it deflated!! We are in transition of moving, are are using this as our only bed!! :( Read tons of reviews and this was supposed to be a great mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy and great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was moving in to the new apartament and my old bed was damaged, needed something quickly to sleep on, so I Purchased this mattress. I was so positively surprised. Its very comfortable, even better then my old bed mattress. Easy to inflate. The size of queen is almost like a king. Dont know what happend but after a month it got a hole on the floor.. Called customer service and was very happy how quickly they took care of the warranty. I had new mattress in one week.. If you need air mattress this is the for you...
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja Szymaniak

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: Got this air bed six months ago for my grandson to sleep on. Best air mattress I've had and grandson was very comfortable sleeping on it. Unfortunately, a small hole showed up on the top of the mattress. I contacted King Koil with the problem and they immediately approved the warranty claim and I received my brand new mattress in a couple of days. Great fast service. The mattress was used frequently and not sure how the hole happened. Overall I think the product quality is very good. The company representative was professional, friendly, and provided great service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great bed BUT doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: First time used right after I purchased was amazing. Deflated, stored. Took out this week to use for second time and there is a slow leak - disappointed as I cannot find leak. Tried two nights in a row and by morning lost air and was sinking in it. Not sure what to do and I purchased the most expensive bed with the thought that I would never have to deal with this issue. Cannot return since I purchased 60 days ago....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hole appeared after two uses
customer_reviews.text: I'm utterly disappointed in this airbed. I barely used it... maybe twice. It's only used on the days I want to sleep in the living room with my big TV on. I like that there's a "built in pillow". More comfortable than many airbeds. The third time I tried using it, there was an obvious hole on the side where the lining curves. Definitely not durable and won't last you. I'm trying to figure out a way to fix it... if not... trash. So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good Nights Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Easy setup and my guests said it was very comfortable with enough room. Loved how easy it was to inflate! Queen sheets fit fine. Nice for 2 adults. The only thing for me it was hard to know exactly "when" to stop inflating it, as not to fill it too much. (I would like a pressure gauge or visual) My guests said it seemed to deflate a little through the night,(or we did not put enough air in) so we put more in the next night without fear...to get the right pressure. Other than that it seemed to work great! Easy to deflate, fold and store. I would absolutely recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product to uses occasionally
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my stepson when ever he comes over for the weekend. We have the queen size. Our sheets fit over it just fine, there is a lip on the side of the plug which I wish was on the other side, not the fondest of the plug being on the same side of that would be considered a pillow. Overall I like the product, it inflates pretty quick as well as deflates, it folds up well just don’t bend the circles when folding, it will make the folding process harder and it won’t fit in the bag after. I believe if you use this bed occasionally, it will last longer and will serve its purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this air bed (Harmful Chemicals)
customer_reviews.text: This manufacturer doesn’t mention anywhere on their page that this product contains harmful chemicals. I had an allergic reaction. Then I read about this things and found they are aware of this thing that state of California declared that this product have some agents which are carcinogenic. I request amazon for investigation. I’ll also contact CDC to report this issue. If you guys have or had any issue please report asap. I called amazon customer service and reported this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Biwi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was much better than any I have purchased before. I have bought the intex mattress' but this for the money beats it hands down. The one feature that I truly love is the deflate. It airs up and deflates very fast. With other brands the trick was always to get the little bit of air out and get it folded to fit in the bag - again! Not a problem with this mattress. Very comfortable and the motor, while it does have some noise is nothing like the intexz. Will buy again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beaird

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the mattress and used it a couple of times and it developed a leak in the side seam. It was unfortunate as we really liked the quality of the mattress itself and comfort level. After contacting King Koil and submitting the required documentation, we received the new mattress within two days. I mean this was above and beyond in my opinion and our guest didn’t have to be inconvenienced for the remainder of their stay. I am truly impressed with their commitment to their product and customers. Excellent job King Koil!
customer_reviews.author: Synergist

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after less than 2 months, UNCOMFORTABLE, no response after 3 months of waiting
customer_reviews.text: There is a huge lip around the border that makes this SO UNCOMFORTABLE. This inflated great and was usable..so is the floor though. Started to deflate after 2 months. Bought in January, deflated in March...I contacted King Koil in March..waited until June (with no response back) to write this review. $130 mattress after tax...cost me $65 a month for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous in CA

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on the mattress for about a month and a half now due to a long PCS move, and it sleeps me and my 4 & 5 YO children comfortably. It has withstood the jumps and bounces that come from my children as well as a deflate for about two weeks and then being re-inflated. I have had no issue thus far and I would definitely recommend to other buyers!!
customer_reviews.author: P&G J

customer_reviews.title: Just sleep on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: The bed deflates immediately after I inflate. To keep it full with air, I had to keep inflating it. If I wanted to sleep on the floor, I would've saved my money. Update: So this model has an integrated air pump and only god knows why; an emergency air valve. Guess where the hole is? The emergency air valve has a tear at it's seam. Company has been contacted. Awaiting answer. Until then, rubber cement and hopeful wishing. Shoe Goo fixed the whole, however, the mattress didn't last long. RIP
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We had two guests at different times this summer...one couple and then another adult. They all said the bed was very comfortable and I know it was super easy to set up. Finding sheets and a mattress cover that had deep enough pockets to fully cover the mattress is the real issue. I bought both that I thought would fit but they didn't. Luckily the ridges in the mattress sides proved to be where each (cover and sheet) could rest without popping off the mattress. Also so awesome to let the air out...minutes and a great storage bag as well!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased an Intex air mattress and let me just say that was a big mistake. Followed the instructions to inflate the bed prior to the first use to allow for some "stretch" in the material. It fully deflated in around 48 hours with no one sleeping on it. Refilled again and deflated in the same time frame. Returned immediately & got a King Koil for around double the price, and it's AMAZING!! Holds air rock solid for 3+ days, no "stretch", no deflation. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 queen-size air mattresses to accommodate our growing family (adult children, spouses and grand-kids) and we're very happy with them. VERY easy to set-up and inflate, as comfortable as an air mattress can be and easy to deflate and put away. We used an extra mattress cover for additional comfort and queen-size sheets fit as long as you don't try stretching them to the floor (that was just impossible). There seemed to be a little deflation (with one of them) over the 48 hours but nothing significant.
customer_reviews.author: Smitsmah

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inflatable bed in an emergency situation in which I needed a bed I could inflate in my apartment living room and put away in the morning. It is easy to inflate and comfortable for sleeping. I like the height of it, which is similar to a regular bed, because it is easy to sit and stand up. I point this out because I am 80 years old, and other seniors may be concerned about the ease of getting in and out of it. It is firm, and as wide as a single bed. Holds up all night. I have slept well in it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air anymore, less than 1 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: If this air mattress had lasted longer than 1 use without losing air, I’d have rated it much higher. We bought it in December for family coming at Christmas. The next time I brought it out, which was a few weeks ago (June) for our God children to come, it would not hold air. Seems that there is a very slow leak from one of the seals. By the time the kids woke up, they were halfway to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for our guests!
customer_reviews.text: Our relatives visiting were very comfortable on the air bed. It takes about 5 minutes to inflate to firm pressure and about the same time to deflate the bed. It remained fairly firm for a couple weeks when we deflated it and stored it away for our next guests. It did smell like PCV for a couple days, but that went away. It's very convenient to have this bed for guests. It is bed top is slightly smaller than regular queen size, the listed queen size measurements are taken from the slightly bulging sides.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: First did not last. Customer service solid. Fingers crossed on second
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an eight year old, seventy pound child to sleep on at beach cottage. Mattress did not last a single night. Had a huge tear at the seam. Clearly defective. ** Shortly after posting review I received a message proactively from Patrick at King Koil. He immediately shipped a replacement mattress. I have updated to three stars based on the solid service and will reconsider if this one lasts, but solid customer service for sure.**
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of air beds because its better for my bad back, but this is by far the best that I have tried. Very comfortable and keeps air for long periods of time. I only have to add a little air every now and then. Intex is usually my preference but their new beds are too hard for me. I recommend this King Coil for anyone in need of a good air mattress, plus the company has given me plenty of notices that if there is any problems contact them, the bed has a 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought our King Koil mattress last years it is so easy to inflate and deflate with its built in electric pump. It sits up higher with the double layer mattress so it’s easy to get a n and out of this bed. It is firm and comfortable to sleep on. They are also a company that stands behind their product. If you have any questions or troubles they have phone support to help you through. I developed an issue a year after purchase and they stood behind their product without question. Great job King Koil!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Meehan

product_meta.title: King Koil Queen Air Mattress with Built-in Pump - Best Inflatable Airbed Queen Size - Elevated Raised Air Mattress Quilt Top 1-Year Manufacturer Guarantee Included
feature_bullets: 1-YEAR WARRANTY PROVIDED BY THE MANUFACTURER INCLUDED IN YOUR PURCHASE! - KING KOIL ENHANCED QUEEN AIRBED TECHNOLOGY with a - Soft Flocking Layer and a Built-in Pillow. Built For Maximum Comfort - We Stand Behind Our Quality & Warranty! WARRANTY DETAILS IN PACKAGING AND WITH AIRBED PURCHASE.

EXTRA THICK DURABLE WATERPROOF COMFORT QUILT TOP with Extra Spinal Support - Firm Mattress Provides Good Sleeping Posture - Sueded Top keeps bedding in place. The built-in pump features separate inflate and deflate knobs for simple and fast inflation.

QUEEN SIZED AIRBED with Coil-Beam Construction and a BUILT-IN 120V / 210W AC Pump - Inflated Dimensions: 80" x 60" x 20" Should you accidentally puncture or tear your air mattress, all King Koil air mattresses include patch kits.

EASY TO USE plug in internal pump allows fast & easy inflation / deflation. The King Koil mattress reaches full inflation in under 2 minutes. The King Koil air mattress is designed for in-home use and is perfect for overnight guests, friends or relatives, and camping trips. Remember, although it holds air extremely well, you can always click the pump on for a few seconds to inflate or deflate to your desired comfort level!

CUSTOMER FRIENDLY 1-YEAR GUARANTEE offered. KING KOIL IS THE ONLY manufacturer that is endorsed by the International Chiropractors Association to help promote proper spinal alignment and a healthier night's sleep.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars11,132 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
